title: Bone Rattle
summaries: The Bone Rattle is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Baby Face Monster to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Baby Face Monster will appear to hold onto a flying Crimera-like creature to catch up to them. The Bone Rattle has a 1/20 (5%) chance of being dropped by the Brain of Cthulhu.

statistics.Sell: 7 GC50 SC
